slide_content_0: Vola Sports is a third-party sports streaming service that fetches live sports content from public sources. The app mostly offers soccer and cricket streams, but it does also have other sports content, including basketball, football, rugby, boxing, MMA, wrestling, motorsports, and many more. The Vola Sports app also offers 200+ sports channels from all around the world. Popular Asian, Middle Eastern, European, and North American sports television networks, including Fox Sports, Bahrain Sport, Eurosport, BelN Sports, UFC TV, FOX, MLB TV, Tennis Plus, FS1/ FS2 Asia, True Sport 7, NFL Channel, NBA TV, Tennis Channel, MLB Network, and ESPN can be streamed on Vola Sports. Although not every live channel stream provides a high-definition picture, the quality goes up to 720p for popular sports channels. Since the developer of Vola Sports is using web scrapers for public channel links, some of the channels might not work until the developer updates the sources. The Vola Sports app also has
slide_content_1: a neat, easily accessible schedule, with a countdown next to every upcoming major sports event so that you can catch your favorite team in action on time. In addition, you can stream highlights of important cricket and soccer games on-demand. Alongside sports channels, Vola Sports also offers international news channels, which include Al Jazeera, Sky News, CBS News, CNN, Euro News, ABC News, Cheddar News, Bloomberg Asia, etc. The streaming app officially supports Fire TV devices, including the Firestick. Navigation works flawlessly with the Fire TV Remote. The user interface is quite generic, which isn't a bad thing. There are no fancy DVR playback options found in the app, considering that the app is already pretty lightweight. It doesn't occupy as much storage space as official streaming apps for Fire TV devices. As previously mentioned, the stream links in Vola Sports are fetched from public sources, which means that you won't be required to pay for a subscription fee. You get free and unlimited access to your favorite sports with Vola Sports. No strings attached.
